Title: Establishes a clinical preceptorship personal income tax credit for certain health care professionals who provide preceptor instruction to students
Summary: Establishes a clinical preceptorship personal income tax credit for certain health care professionals who provide preceptor instruction to students studying to be a health care professional.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a personal income tax credit for preceptor clinicians who provide preceptor instruction; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
